identificationModule.briefTitle: Cardiac Performance System Data Collection Study - Minnesota
identificationModule.officialTitle: Cardiac Performance System Data Collection Study - Minnesota

descriptionModule.briefSummary: Non-significant risk device study to conduct evaluation of the performance of new device for monitoring of cardiac function (based on previous iterations 510(k) 173156)
descriptionModule.detailedDescription: Non-significant risk device study to conduct evaluation of the performance of new device for monitoring of cardiac function (based on previous iterations 510(k) 173156)

armGroups.label: Cardiac Function Monitoring
armGroups.description: Subjects scheduled for cardiac catheterization will undergo measurement with the Cardiac Performance System non-invasive device for a brief period before the catheterization procedure.

interventions.name: Cardiac Performance System (NSR)
interventions.description: Participants will be asked to wear the Cardiac Performance System, a non-invasive sensor device on their upper abdomen. The Cardiac Performance System monitoring device will continuously monitor cardiac function.

primaryOutcomes.measure: Cardiac Performance System electronic data for Cardiac Output
primaryOutcomes.description: Cardiac function metric measurement including Cardiac Output to report in L/m.

primaryOutcomes.measure: Cardiac Performance System electronic data for Pulmonary Artery Pressure
primaryOutcomes.description: Cardiac function metric measurement including Pulmonary Artery Pressure to report in mmHg.

primaryOutcomes.measure: Cardiac Performance System electronic data for Pulmonary Capillary Wedge Pressure
primaryOutcomes.description: Cardiac function metric measurement including Pulmonary Capillary Wedge Pressure to report in mmHg.

primaryOutcomes.measure: Pulmonary Artery Catheter electronic data for Cardiac Output
primaryOutcomes.description: Cardiac function metric measurement including Cardiac Output to report in L/m.

primaryOutcomes.measure: Pulmonary Artery Catheter electronic data for Pulmonary Artery Pressure
primaryOutcomes.description: Cardiac function metric measurement including Pulmonary Artery Pressure to report in mmHg.

primaryOutcomes.measure: Pulmonary Artery Catheter electronic data for Pulmonary Capillary Wedge Pressure
primaryOutcomes.description: Cardiac function metric measurement including Pulmonary Capillary Wedge Pressure to report in mmHg.

primaryOutcomes.measure: Echocardiography electronic data for Ejection Fraction
primaryOutcomes.description: Cardiac function measurement including left ventricle ejection fraction to report in percentage.
primaryOutcomes.timeFrame: 15 minutes at a time prior to or after Pulmonary Artery Catheter procedure

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Ability to provide written informed consent
* 22 years of age or older
* Referred for cardiac catheterization for reasons including heart failure, evaluation before transplant, pulmonary hypertension, shortness of breath, valvular disease, etc.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Previous Heart Transplant
* Presence of Left Ventricular Assist Device
* Presence of a Holter monitor or any other electrical leads on the chest at the time of sensor placement
* Surgical scars/wounds/bandages/ports at the site of sensor placement
eligibilityModule.studyPopulation: Patients scheduled for cardiac catheterization procedure
